title: Jungle items

replies.body:
The main difference between those three jungle items is in their bonus effects. You should be able to see all the details by looking over your items sets in your Collection, but I'll lay out the basics here for ya!

{{item:3706}} has Chilling Smite which allows {{summoner:11}} to hit champions and slow them
{{item:3711}}  has Warding which will let you place Stealth Wards
{{item:3715}}  has Challenging Smite which lets {{summoner:11}} hit champions and also lowers their damage against you while making your autos deal extra damage
